Class CertUtils

java.lang.Object
com.sicomsa.dmt.util.CertUtils
public final class CertUtils extends Object
Helper methods for loading certificates and private keys from files.

    • CertUtils

      public CertUtils()

  • Method Details

    • loadCredentials

      public static RealCredentials loadCredentials(String rfc, String certFile, String keyFile, char[] pwd)
      Creates RealCredentials from the contents of a certificate file and a private key file with a given password.
      Parameters:
      rfc - the RFC that the RealCredentials will have
      certFile - the file name of the file that contains the certificate
      keyFile - the file name of the file that contains the private key
      pwd - the password related to the private key
      Returns:
      the RealCredentials with with a X509Certificate and a PrivateKey retrieved from a certificate file and a private key file with a given password and rfc.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if rfc is null or blank
      NullPointerException - if certFile, keyFile or pwd are null
      RepositoryException - if any other problem arose while creating the entry

    • loadAsKeyStoreEntry

      public static KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry loadAsKeyStoreEntry(String certFile, String keyFile, char[] pwd)
      Creates a KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry from the contents of a certificate file and a private key file with a given password.
      Parameters:
      certFile - the file name of the file that contains the certificate
      keyFile - the file name of the file that contains the private key
      pwd - the password related to the private key
      Returns:
      a KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry with a X509Certificate and a PrivateKey retrieved from a certificate file and a private key file with a given password.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if certFile, keyFile or pwd are null
      RepositoryException - if any other problem arose while creating the entry

    • loadCertificate

      public static X509Certificate loadCertificate(String fileName) throws IOException, CertificateException
      Creates a X509Certificate from the contents of a file with the specified fileName.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the fileName of the file to get the certificate from
      Returns:
      a X509Certificate read from a file
      Throws:
      IOException - if there were IO related problems
      CertificateException - if there were Certificate related problems
      NullPointerException - if fileName is null

    • loadCertificate

      public static X509Certificate loadCertificate(File file) throws IOException, CertificateException
      Creates a X509Certificate from the contents of a File.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to get the certificate from
      Returns:
      a X509Certificate read from a file
      Throws:
      IOException - if there were IO related problems
      CertificateException - if there were Certificate related problems
      NullPointerException - if file is null

    • loadCertificate

      public static X509Certificate loadCertificate(InputStream in) throws CertificateException
      Creates a X509Certificate from an inputstream.
      Parameters:
      in - the imputstream that contains the certificate
      Returns:
      a X509Certificate build from the inputstream
      Throws:
      CertificateException - if there were Certificate related problems
      NullPointerException - if in is null

    • loadPrivateKey

      public static PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(String fileName, char[] pwd) throws IOException, org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException, org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException
      Creates a PrivateKey from the specified fileName and password.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the fileName of the file containing the data of the private key
      pwd - the password related to the private key
      Returns:
      a PrivateKey created from the specified file and password
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was IO problems
      org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException - if there were other conversion problems
      org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - if there were other problems
      NullPointerException - if fileName or pwd are null

    • loadPrivateKey

      public static PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(File file, char[] pwd) throws IOException, org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException, org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException
      Creates a PrivateKey from the specified file and password.
      Parameters:
      file - the file containing the data of the private key
      pwd - the password related to the private key
      Returns:
      a PrivateKey created from the specified file and password
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was IO problems
      org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException - if there were other conversion problems
      org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - if there were other problems
      NullPointerException - if file or pwd are null

    • loadPrivateKey

      public static PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(byte[] data, char[] pwd) throws IOException, org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException, org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException
      Creates a PrivateKey from the specified data and password.
      Parameters:
      data - the data that contains the private key
      pwd - the password related to the private key
      Returns:
      a PrivateKey created from the specified data and password
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was IO problems
      org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException - if there were other conversion problems
      org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - if there were other problems
      NullPointerException - if data or pwd are null
